body_html: It's not that a "negative" leak is intrinsically bad, but it means that there is some problem in our testing methodology. That problem is worth investigating into, esp. if there are actually memory problems on Windows.
body_text: It's not that a "negative" leak is intrinsically bad, but it means that there is some problem in our testing methodology. That problem is worth investigating into, esp. if there are actually memory problems on Windows.
body: It's not that a "negative" leak is intrinsically bad, but it means that there is some problem in our testing methodology. That problem is worth investigating into, esp. if there are actually memory problems on Windows.
